item.title: Matrix is back, it never shuts down!
item.dc:creator: @alex321 alex321
item.description:
@alex321 wrote:

[quote=“blakew, post:7, topic:449635”]Rofl #1 This is the server downloads section
#2 You are a complete idiot, about the 4th server I’ve seen trying to “bring back” Matrix, and even using the same name. I swear, you guys will never learn… Just because Matrix was popular and had a lot of players and (possibly?) made lots of money does not mean that you are going to just by bringing it back lol. Nobody is going to go and play a leeched server even if it was once popular, it will only be popular in its original state with its original owner…

If you were aiming to get it popular and have a popular server you would have to actually fix up things, add new stuff, think up an original name etc etc[/quote]
agree whit this guy

Read full topic

@blakew wrote:

Rofl #1 This is the server downloads section
#2 You are a complete idiot, about the 4th server I’ve seen trying to “bring back” Matrix, and even using the same name. I swear, you guys will never learn… Just because Matrix was popular and had a lot of players and (possibly?) made lots of money does not mean that you are going to just by bringing it back lol. Nobody is going to go and play a leeched server even if it was once popular, it will only be popular in its original state with its original owner…

If you were aiming to get it popular and have a popular server you would have to actually fix up things, add new stuff, think up an original name etc etc
